# Quickstarts Docs

> Documentation for Quickstarts Docs.

*Topics available: 2*

- ['Quickstart: Build your first Orleans app with ASP.NET Core'](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/quickstarts/build-your-first-orleans-app.md): Learn how to use Orleans to build a scalable, distributed ASP.NET Core application
- [Deploy and scale an Orleans app on Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/quickstarts/deploy-scale-orleans-on-azure.md): Host and scale an Orleans app on Azure Container Apps with Azure Container Registry and Azure Table Storage or Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL.
